author: allee8285
msg: Fix test cases running in DB2 due to 1) dict.forUpdateClause must be obtained after emf is created because specific dictionary may override the value of this attribute, 2) The forUpdateClause in DB2 is LockMode type dependent, (i.e. WITH RR/RS) therefore can not depends on this attribute for positive test case comparison, negative test ok.
